name: Cherrim
description: The faint scent that emanates from its full blossom entices bug Pokémon to it.

abilities.name: Spring Bloom
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn’t have a Rule Box (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes).
